title: Do we need an EHCP? If we do, what do we do now?
description:
This course by Dr Abigail Fisher helps parents struggling with anxiety and misinformation about the EHCP process. It enables parents to make sense of this process and understand more about what you can do to influence it. It covers 4 main areas:
 
(1) Why do you need an EHCP?
(2) What's the process
(3) Essential tips on getting a useful plan
(4) Look at some reports and tips on drafting a plan
